EmailTemplate.name: EMS Modify AccessRequest Denied
EmailTemplate.subject: Your request to remove access from {!UserProvisioningRequest.AppName} is denied
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Thank you for your interest in {!UserProvisioningRequest.AppName}.
This email is notification that your request to revoke access for {!UserProvisioningRequest.Target_User_Name__c} to {!UserProvisioningRequest.AppName} has been denied.
If you have any questions or concerns about this situation, please call us toll free at 1-866-270-4706 or email at websitesupport@landolakes.com.
Sincerely,
Business Link
